places.name: Cape Coast Castle
places.address: Cape Coast Castle, Cape Coast, Ghana
places.description: A historical fortress used in the trans-Atlantic slave trade, now a museum and heritage site.

places.name: Kakum National Park
places.description: A popular rainforest reserve known for its canopy walkway and diverse wildlife.

places.name: Elmina Castle
places.description: Another major castle used during the slave trade, offering tours and rich history.

places.name: Fort William Lighthouse
places.description: An old British fort turned lighthouse, offering great coastal views.

places.name: University Garden
places.address: University of Cape Coast, Cape Coast, Ghana
places.description: A peaceful space with rare flora used for research and relaxation.

places.name: Cape Coast Sports Stadium
places.address: Cape Coast Stadium, Victoria Park Rd, Cape Coast, Ghana
places.description: Modern sports complex hosting football matches and community events.

places.name: Ridge Royal Hotel
places.address: 1st Ridge, Cape Coast, Central Region, Ghana
places.description: Luxury hotel offering comfort and modern amenities.

places.name: Kotokuraba Market
places.description: A bustling market with fresh produce, local food, textiles, and crafts.
